example.parse: (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الحاجة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الضاغطة)) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المساعدات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المالية)))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS جعلت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ-2 (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC العقل))) (S (VP (PUNC ") (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يمجد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (PUNC ") (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الدعم) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_ACC الخارجي))))
